title: Tether's Stablecoin USDT 'Has a Peg Stability Problem', Claims Analyst
description: One possible solution would be for Tether to reconsider its redemption fee and minimum redeemable amount, says a Kaiko analyst.

title: Bitcoin holds steady amid surprising U.S. unemployment surge and dollar dip
description:
Quick Take The recent rise in the U.S. unemployment rate from 3.5% to 3.8%, despite projections of it holding steady, has presented an intriguing scenario in the financial sector. This increase has occurred alongside a surge in non-farm payrolls, which exceeded expectations by reaching 187,000 instead of the anticipated 170,000. This suggests a complexity in […]

The post Bitcoin holds steady amid surprising U.S. unemployment surge and dollar dip appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Women hold just 6% of crypto CEO roles highlighting gap in leadership – report
description:
A new report reveals women are vastly underrepresented in leadership positions across the cryptocurrency and blockchain industries. The study analyzed 50 leading crypto and blockchain companies. It found only 6% of CEOs were women, while men held 94% of top executive positions. Looking at broader leadership roles beyond CEO, men occupied 77.6% and just 22.4% […]

The post Women hold just 6% of crypto CEO roles highlighting gap in leadership – report appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Nexo Launches Crypto Mastercard for EEA Citizens
description: The card supports transactions in Euro, U.S. dollar, and British pound, and stablecoins for over 100 million merchant terminals globally.

title: Elon Musk’s xAI Aims to Uncover the Mysteries of Existence through AI
description: Tesla, SpaceX, and X CEO Elon Musk have once again ignited discussions around artificial intelligence (AI) by pondering whether AI holds the key to answering fundamental questions about the existence of our world. Musk’s newly launched service, xAI, aims to delve into these inquiries in the “coming weeks and months,” according to his recent response ... Read more

title: Toncoin (TON) Makes Strides Toward Top 10 Largest Cryptocurrencies with 25% Price Surge and Innovative Launch of Tact – Investors, Keep an Eye Out
description: Toncoin has launched a new programming language dubbed Tact. Tact is designed to look like other top programming languages like Python, JavaScript, and Solidity. Toncoin (TON) blockchain has hit a milestone with the innovative launch of Tact, a new programming language designed for creating smart contracts on the network.  Even though it may appear that [...]

title: Analyst Stokes Fears, Says Bitcoin Could Drop to $20k in September
description:
After a choppy few weeks for Bitcoin, crypto analyst Ran Neuner has predicted that the leading crypto could hit a lower low of $20,000 this month. In a new YouTube video, Neuner, also known as Crypto Banter, referenced historic price charts, which showed that the BTC often declines in September. Alongside the overall crypto market, […]

The post Analyst Stokes Fears, Says Bitcoin Could Drop to $20k in September appeared first on Coin Edition.
